Name: Jack's Godfather Highball
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Highball (max 10oz/300ml) glass .
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.
Review: Three popular ingredients combine to make the ultimate Italian American highball. Named, appropriately, after the most famous Italian American of the silver screen. (Not Rocky!)
History: Highball cocktails info, history and tips on the perfect serve
Nutrition: One serving of Jack's Godfather Highball contains 172 calories
